title: TYPE BATTLE: Week 17 (17 July)
content:
TYPE BATTLE: Week 17 (17 July)

Here's your chance to stretch your type muscles on a weekly basis. Each game kicks off on Monday with a new challenge, and closes at midnight PST on Friday. Anyone may submit a design response to the challenge. You may enter as often as you wish. Post anytime. Critiques and comments are welcome throughout the game, from participants and spectators alike. Smack talk is encouraged.

Winner take all, no holds barred. May the best designer win.

Link directly to this thread: [http://www.typophile.com/battle17](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.typophile.com/battle17)

Requirements:

- Size: 600 width x 400 height. 72 dpi  
- Color: Black and white only  
- Format: Please save your graphics as PNG  
- Only respond with the characters posted in the challenge.

// THIS WEEK'S CHALLENGE:  
// Design a stencil font (or at least 10 characters). Extra points for actually stenciling it somewhere (legally).
author: Christian Robertson

comments.content:
"stenciling it somewhere (legally)"

And can we get even more points for stenciling it somewhere illegally? ;)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stencil_5683.png)

I will see what I can do about actually painting it somewhere later this week. Could look funky - illustrator drips and overspray along with real drips and overspray.

Here goes nuthin'.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stencil_4560.png)
Not new, the stencil version of Capone.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Pieter_Stencil_1_4513.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Pieter_Stencil_2_5177.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Pieter_Stencil_3_6443.gif)
nice!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typophile_fatcap_5099.gif)

'PlayR FatCap', that is. :)

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.dav.name/)

_Addendum: And, Some links to 'things' I previously stenciled and / or types I customized for stencil lettering: [www.formlos.net/Folio/formpalmerslos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.formlos.net/Folio/formpalmerslos), [www.formlos.net/Folio/Irvine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.formlos.net/Folio/Irvine), [www.formlos.net/Folio/Humbug](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.formlos.net/Folio/Humbug), [www.formlos.net/Folio/MedienGroupie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.formlos.net/Folio/MedienGroupie), [www.formlos.net/Folio/DanMoko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132/http:/www.formlos.net/Folio/DanMoko)_
Christian: Sorry if this is dense after 17 weeks but: where are the winners announced, and what do they get? I look at the retired challenges but I see no final results.
There's no real 'winner' par say. It's more peer consensus and congratulatory remarks for a challenge well done from my understanding.

Good, so nobody has done anything like this yet.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/astencilsamp_6559.png)
  
(No points for recognizing what this is based around.)

Comic Stencil?

ChrisL

I want to start my own…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stencil_battle17_5478.png)

Pieter,  
That caketype shirt looks yummy! The overspray reminds me of powdered sugar on that dark shirt. Now you just need some frosting :-)

ChrisL

Im off to find some red spray paint :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stencil_6441.png)
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture2_4971.png)

Hi Lari,

I've got a request for you; can I email you? send me a message.

Carl
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TypeBattle17-StencilFont_6305.png)

Very nice Duncan!

ChrisL
dache, that is so \*\*\*\* hot!

Last minute entry: This sketch was laying around all week and I forgot to cut the shapes out. So there's no t-shirt or graffiti'ed wall but this is the page with the letters cut out. I want to go use the stencil on something! Time to get some spray paint.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302150132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ccstencilart_6409.gif)
